scripts.dev: set -a && source .env.dev && set +a && nodemon --exec ts-node src/server.ts
scripts.dev:db:start: set -a && source .env.dev && set +a && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.dev:db:setup: set -a && source .env.dev && set +a && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && sleep 3 && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx ts-node seed.ts
scripts.test:integration: set -a && source .env.test && set +a && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && sleep 3 && npx prisma migrate deploy && vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.ts; docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
